thread.title: Can Achy Joints Predict the Weather?

author: Heidi Mitchell
title: Can Achy Joints Predict the Weather?
text:
Your grandpa probably complained that rain was coming—he could feel it in his knees. We wouldn’t want to question an elder’s wisdom, but it is there any scientific basis in his claims? One expert, Elaine Husni, director of Cleveland Clinic’s Arthritis and Musculoskeletal Center, explains the effects of barometric pressure and why these aches and pains could be telling.
A Hard Rain’s Gonna Fall 
Dr. Husni says that many, but not all, of her osteoarthritis patients complain that weather does influence their pain levels. “There... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
